nodes.text: Jonas Nova was one of the two founders of Nova Orion Industries, along with his old friend Garrick Orion. However, sometime following 0 BBY they nearly split the organization due to their growing mutual suspicion and distrust.

Jonas Nova appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
